directions: In a large glass bowl, mix the tomatoes, garbanzo beans, celery, cucumber, green onions, sweet onion, parsley, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, lemon juice, and garlic. Pour in the tomato juice. Season with curry powder, tarragon, pepper, and hot pepper sauce. Chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Fresh Market Gazpacho
